quintinary: Call us for a personalized quotation

cuaternary: If you are organizing an event

primary: We are a family business, from a family with a long baking tradition. Four generations of our family have dedicated their lifes to bake the best cakes and cookies. We are specialized in frenc passtiserie, and we have more than 40 years of expertise in the sector
secondary: French desserts: Café liégeois, Calisson, Charlotte, Clafoutis, Coconut cake, Crème brûlée, Crème caramel, Crêpe Suzette, Croquembouche, Custard tart, Dariole, Dame blanche, Éclair, Flaugnarde, Floating island, etc
Pastries: Banbury cake, Bougatsa, Bridie, Chouquette, Cream Horn, Croissant, Eclair, Ensaimada, Mooncake, Pain aux raisins, Pain au Chocolat, Palmier, Baklava
Cakes: Chocolate cake, strawberry cake, santiago cake, Banana Cake, Bundt Cake, Carrot Cake, Roscón de Reyes, Brownie, Schwarzwälder Kirschtorte, Punschkrapfen
cuaternary: If you come to {{title}} you will always find something of your liking. And if you can't find anything, just tell us which kind of pastry you would like and we will be delighted to prepare it for you right away. As long as you are ok with waiting for the dough to raise and the pastry to get baked, of course
We have been baking stuff for more than 40 years. What else can we tell you about us? We know what you do, we know our cakes, we know our pastries. Try them and you'll be back.

title: Our clients
description: Very yummy cakes. I like the chocolate one. The french pastries have funny names, but they are pretty good too. The coffee is just ok, so you can skip it.
After they won the XXV international baking tournament 'Ciudad de Palermo', I couldn't help to visit them to see if they were as good as they told. They are.
I've been having two of their croissants as my saturday breakfast for years. Years ago they were good, but now they are using 3x more butter, they are even better.
name: Ramon, Australia
Mikael, Finland
Joan, US
